data.html: Holding out on MedCalc or even MedCalc Pro? Now is the time to upgrade, our unlock is FREE for the rest of October!

data.html: üÜô The update to 3.0.7 is now live! Brings stability and localization improvements and fixes problems with our built-in web browser.

data.html: Good news everyone! Version 3.0.6 restoring functionality of all YES/NO buttons has been approved and should appear on your devices soon.
data.text: Good news everyone! Version 3.0.6 restoring functionality of all YES/NO buttons has been approved and should appear on your devices soon.

data.html: There‚Äôs a bug in version 3.0.5 affecting YES/NO controls. A fix has been submitted. Sorry for the trouble. üò¨

data.html: Version 3.0.4, fixing Peak Flow not accepting perfectly fine input and showing a blank popup instead, is now available!
data.text: Version 3.0.4, fixing Peak Flow not accepting perfectly fine input and showing a blank popup instead, is now available!

data.html: And here we go, version 3.0.3 should appear in the App Store in the next hours! Now with full support for the iPhone 6 and iOS 8, Touch-ID for the patient DB and three new formulas: BODEx, RIETE and Padua

data.html: Version 2.7.1 should be live now, fixing the crash-at-startup some users experienced. Sorry about that, let us know if you still experience problems!

data.html: We're inching in on the crash-at-startup problem! For those affected please turn off iCloud in the Settings App » MedCalc for now. Sorry for the trouble. 😞
